General.Name: Vetropack Holding SA
General.Description: Vetropack Holding AG, together with its subsidiaries, offers glass packaging products for the food and beverage industry. It provides glass bottles and jars. The company also serves food, pharmaceutical, and cosmetics industries. It has operations in Switzerland, Austria, the Czech Republic, Croatia, Slovakia, Ukraine, Italy, and the Republic of Moldova. The company was founded in 1911 and is headquartered in Bülach, Switzerland.
